TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventClassAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Marks the attributed class as an event class. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If `EventClass` is specified, it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog; if enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component.
Method calls on an event class are never delivered to the implementation; they are instead delivered to event subscribers.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of EventClassAttribute, see the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventClassAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks There is no unconfigured default value for this attribute. The following table shows initial property values for a configured instance of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventClassAttribute>.
|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |`FireInParallel`|`false`| |`AllowInProcSubscribers`|`true`| |`PublisherFilter`|`null`|

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether subscribers can be activated in the publisher's process.
Docs.value: if subscribers can be activated in the publisher's process; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether events are to be delivered to subscribers in parallel.
Docs.value: if events are to be delivered to subscribers in parallel; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a publisher filter for an event method.
